name: Ancient Asian Sagas
author: CharaForge AI
description: Weave tales of honor, myth, and destiny in a world inspired by the rich tapestry of ancient Asian history and mythology. This advanced pack uses nested wildcards to create deeply contextual characters.

promptTemplates.name: Full Character Profile
promptTemplates.template: {masterpiece_quality}, cinematic full body portrait of a {character_profile}, {scene}, {art_style}

promptTemplates.name: Atmospheric Scene
